com.lehman.ic9.sys

Class sys

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lehman.ic9.sys.sys

  • public class sys
extends java.lang.Object
    Class sys implements various calls related to system level functions. It defines information about the host operating system and the Java environment.
    Author:
    Austin Lehman

      • getSysInfo

        public static java.lang.String getSysInfo()
        Gets a string with various system information. It includes OS, Java and Path information in a human readable format.
        Returns:
        A string with a variety of system information.

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long Mills)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Causes the current thread to sleep for the provided number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        Mills - is a long integer with number of milliseconds to sleep.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception

      • getMills

        public static long getMills()
        Gets the current time as a long integer as the number of milliseconds since epoch.
        Returns:
        A long integer with milliseconds since epoch.

      • print

        public static void print(java.lang.Object toprint)
        Prints the provided object to standard output. Standard output is piped to console.print method in the first ic9engine script engine.
        Parameters:
        toprint - is an Object which toString will be called on.

      • println

        public static void println(java.lang.Object toprint)
        Prints the provided object to standard output with a new line character at the end. Standard output is piped to console.println method in the first ic9engine script engine.
        Parameters:
        toprint - is an Object which toString will be called on.

      • readln

        public static java.lang.Object readln()
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a line from standard input which is by default the console.
        Returns:
        A String with the captured line from standard input.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception

      • exec

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> exec(ic9engine Eng,
                                                                    java.lang.Object Cmds,
                                                                    java.lang.Object Envs,
                                                                    java.lang.String DirName)
                                                             throws ic9exception,
                                                                    java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                                    javax.script.ScriptException
        Executes an OS command like one would do from the OS shell.
        Parameters:
        Eng - is an instance of the ic9engine.
        Cmds - is a Javascript list of commands to run or a single string with the command to run.
        Envs - Envs is a Javascript Array of strings of environment variables to apply when running the command in 'key=value' pairs.
        DirName - is a String with the directory name to execute the command in.
        Returns:
        A Javascript object with 'exitValue', 'stdout', and 'stderr' attributes.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - Exception
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Exception
        javax.script.ScriptException - Exception
